welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Penistone, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Jet2 Terminal
terminals.description: The Jet2 Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is dedicated to flights operated by Jet2.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily used by low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
